channel.title: 世界 - 最新 - Google新闻

item.title: 特朗普政府认为将36个国家 /地区添加到旅行禁令名单 - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: 特朗普政府认为添加36个国家/地区的旅行列表＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 随着旅行禁令的开始，西澳移民竞赛与家庭团聚href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilwfbvv95cuxobthpws01vlhsrzi2y2y2y2hgmgtcm0owruz1tu5otlgtlgtlgtdenruxlpndenruxlpnghtndjuwwtvnakhezheakhezhezhezhaakhfbc TU2Y09RLXVxQWFXMFladTZYNzh5RDI4SDRmUURuZ09QSkpQVU9BUzFBMDdyMzhZQlNaQWd0Ui0yaTdIRHpSd3M4SHFLWmhRSTBPUVR0cW5tUmhsd3RMLUNFRFVz?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>特朗普的旅行禁令担心克拉克斯顿的索马里难民＆nbsp; nbsp; ajc.com 特朗普旅行禁令：AZ倡导者分享难民家庭的担忧＆nbsp; nbsp; fox 10 Phoenix 特朗普正在考虑将另外36个国家/地区添加到他的无旅行名单中，包括非洲和加勒比国家：报告＆nbsp; nbsp; 独立

item.title: 以色列和伊朗在新攻击中互相罢工 - 路透社
item.description: 伊朗导弹袭击海法，以色列空军攻击tehran ＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipwFBVV95cUxPUlNxUmVXaTJzVkpuZHlqOG8wb0ZxbHU4TldHdDRXaVZES1RpV2pzTEMtUkZkTmJpa3MyL VVWWTLYA2DKR2NTUGZFN3HLYWP6S0I2TJNOC21ISJKZOWVNB0WWM0PKTWXWXGCXKXKXKXKXKXKXKXMNDZVGDULXDJBEN ej0ellootlibmjttdibrafbvv95cuxpajyyt2lnm3iydwvdedhzylbfmtfmtfmtzn2reffmtfmtfmtfmtfjq3zkwezpsg5cb29rnxz5vlnxz5vlnxz5vlbbbbbbbbbbbbxt0fmbkkjkjkkjkkjkkduizn fmbkkjkkduiz ia UZQTERIVVNVCWPDZJMWD3PNVFJYN1JKM2STS0C2X3VXZVDQNE5OS0HHADIYDKJSCC2FWNGVOOW5ZCEZFS3BHHTXFS3BHHADXVS3BHHADINVS3BHHADINVS3BHHADINVSFSFS3BHHADIKFSFSFS3BHADNVQUTNVQZZFGUTVGOUTVGOEE1QUEE1QUE1QUHLKDKDKLKDKLLKLELDQCCCCC25 Target =“ _ Blank”>伊朗最高领导人在以色列罢工中被杀的顶级顾问，州媒体说＆nbsp; nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f”

item.title: 普京和特朗普在电话中讨论了中东紧张局势，乌克兰战争 - AP新闻
item.description: Putin和Trump讨论了中东紧张局势，乌克兰战争，电话 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmie0fvx3lxte1qedz2zhz2zhz6r2vxmwznsgjuwfy4q3fwc2hrt1hrt1hrt1 hrt1qtag9uzmrpnxq0q0q1 l3agx2adrxekhiwd1strqvs1rcs1imwljmjfumenumnumnumnumnumpvn3vacl8zz1plegf0mer0mezjyuvxwlp0mdvrc0jsnhkwqlv qlv Qlv4nnnnnnnnnnnnpvx2ddwoa？ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普：以色列和伊朗之间的战争应结束＆nbsp;＆nbsp; axios 乌克兰无人机破坏了被占领的Zaporizhzhia Oblast摧毁俄罗斯防空系统，军事情报说＆nbsp; nbsp; KYIV独立 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirgFBVV95cUxOcnJ5QXdmOFFyMml4UWh5Q2s4RVBWM0VLSUpQVXFlZjdSVXBsRzZ0NmRtX0ZSenFmckMwQzNDcGZzNUJmdzY0T uy0dwdpx1v0ajrzq0vrd3lfx2nkqwlyywjcdhptujnmcwd4ukdxn2nwynl2u2u2u2u2u2 hnbgnyvvu3s EPVQJK5EXDNTKNUNF9TMHDODVAXSFL1OGDBQULRSXP3ZE9BCMN0QU5LEJDJDJZVZFU0E？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>普京对特朗普说话，谴责以色列对伊朗的罢工，克里姆林宫说＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijafbvv95cuxpsps0jwdkizeunitfl6sli0dlfovvo3vdr4zevsaw1zbkrhedfyffyffyrvlyvlyvlyk2berpnu VoaHFBZ2RtREVFQmhmTnVrX0FaSHA3VzVMRG1yN1FOaGFYMmUxMjlWbHRrTXZfdVJ0UXNNSlkzRWV2dFpzTWdCMWtSSmFtWUZwVS1MdmNMQ0E0R0pnZg?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>特朗普在全球爆发中与普京说话＆nbsp;＆nbsp; politico

item.title: 凯尔·斯塔默爵士宣布国家对美容团伙的调查-BBC
item.description: 凯尔·斯塔默（Keir Starmer）爵士宣布国家调查对美容帮派的调查＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 英国的Starmer宣布全国询问'美容帮派' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiqafbvv95cuxomeoxy0jlce9ncjvoymd1yvvzcthueunqthueunqwxdxdxrnnnqandsohhhhhhgbfppjd22 reze52 reze52 reze5qn2luwwwwex5dj dQa200RWwzcjc5a0w2LW9scnRYdjV1UXQ4UVBTTW5rV1E1OWxYdGhGUnlFNDhxUm0tV1JvWjNzVHQxWHVyX1FXNm9HZ01uMTBjd1QtS3M0dVUwd2pvQ0hoVW5RVFJWbFB iSm1BRWtvc1JaSTnSAa4BQVVfeXFMUC1zRTdKRjF2ZUZXXzRPUDV5Zmx6R0VZYWFnSkxSZ1BNWXBVcHZQck5ILUVXNlV3MmU2OHZWOVNDWVNjRnJRTVVGeUpSWTBBT2NP CDM2N1ZZM3RIBWRXODRRCJRPZEHPNLHHWU5XOGJZREDZRWJVCDLILILNZVWFJXQNB2WAVJNMPRVNHVNHVNHVB3J6J6SNWNWNWNWNETNETNETNETNET target =“ _ blank”>英国宣布在压力之后宣布对'修饰帮派'的调查＆nbsp;＆nbsp; al Jazeera href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirwfbvv95cuxpm1e3svg0rvzrdwgtac1rznrqvzzytusdrgzzzytu1xnrgzzzytu1xndrg1 trg1 rovwwzsjd1dmjpcghmnmszci1qcxfru2dsbzv4nfjimm03x1zyz2kytmnkcvm1akjsa mzavuzrtu5ktwfdu2d3odjqd0dyn3jtwnzkytlhnmz4wes0q1z5udzkzkzwjywnljvhk5 alNUVlkzeEN5ZnVz0gG0AUFVX3lxTE1ZZ1NfZjFHZUVKbWR6UkkyYzhiVk4xTllzNC1jMWo3b3NjYmRuRkhQSjRBbXZYZzRLamJRSGJ2cVo5NnJjSzFHWmItSWc2OTIwRllEN0 tszmlulwjonflqq09oemh6v3dimf9ys21odhazx3u5a292dexsu2tfwmtwri1sseh5vfp6euvjn1luvjn1plurga3dha1plurga3dha1mnwb3bttvc1mnwdktjnftjnftjnft2ppssosksskszndduxzndwwt2psosksaksksaksaksamsksamsksamsksamsksaM target =“ _ blank”>英国，要在马斯克压力＆nbsp; nbsp; ABC News 之后对有组织的儿童性虐待进行调查。

item.title: 当局说，印度航空队长在坠机前不到一分钟就派出了五月天。
item.description: ＆nbsp; nbsp; nbsp; guardian <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxQbS0taXk4YjFkclpUNFFjSk42QVNJaTNZUThiZkpIYks0U0Z2ZFBObmsxdkd4dERfSWRtLS1FVUFRblNDTX fpyjbksjhgy0dwvu9ix3zsawflrgdnoe9vvdhobwkyd002nlqts0hqccvuz1pmuhl0q1c4t mrhcgdqc2pub2dsbfdvnmdwu2rksefnogrvelz6z2vvsggzulrgnldvmtr4t1uzzw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>座位11A中的乘客如何成为印度空气崩溃的唯一幸存者＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi3afbvv95cuxqyun4cu41odh5mnfymlzltjz1adj5 cm8tr2xvy1jquxnsywj6ewgxcepiekhrxzhxzhxwuzulxflajbmmgmgmgvnn2nnbdjhblhjd210zzhusjrvbglxylbccet rbfltr3lim3hirtjuyxrfvwzdrzdrzjpzwyzmm5qotittjh1cedjzxzz0ohnft2xbynjpzvpxvvy4yko5qtlaujzvvh ytulvwvtjqy1dubne0z3v1rgjjn0dwv2v2vqal93c1uyvfcyndjnd2pcs09zdutgchpawnnpb2tqnhnwa0xi？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>在印度杀死的2名父亲的父亲正在散布妻子的灰烬＆nbsp; nbsp; people.com co-pilot错误在新的空气印度崩溃理论中怀疑＆nbsp;＆nbsp; yahoo 等待身体加深印度空气崩溃后家庭的疼痛
